def main():
    n, m = map(int, input().split())
    a = list(map(int, input().split()))

    a.sort(reverse=True)

    days = 0
    pages = 0
    for i in range(n):
        pages += a[i] - i
        if pages >= m:
            days += 1
            pages = 0
        if pages < 0:
            days = -1
            break

    print(days)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
